```{r reading_csv}
agg_yield <- read_csv('MN_Ag_YieldsAndInputs.csv')
agg_yield <- agg_yield %>% arrange(desc(Year))

# Splitting into training and testing
training <- rev(agg_yield %>% filter(agg_yield$Year<2010))
testing <- rev(agg_yield %>% filter(agg_yield$Year>=2010))

training_ts <- ts(rev(ts(training$Corn_BUperAcre,start=c("1866",1))),start=c('1866',1))
testing_ts <- ts(rev(ts(testing$Corn_BUperAcre,start=c("2010",1))),start=c('2010',1))
```

```{r}
checkresiduals(training_ts)
```
